q1: Liverpool is the best English team, is not it?
a1: Liverpool wasn't first, Manchester City was. This means Manchester City is a better team than Liverpool.
q2: Is the older team always the better team?
q3: I consider that Liverpool is the best team
a3: in my opinion it is the liverpool for having reached the final of the champions
q4: What are your criteria for deciding the best team?
a4: At the end of the season, the team that lifted the most major trophies.
